short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that gives you more control over YouTube.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube Controls (For Students) is a versatile browser extension carefully crafted to enhance productivity and enrich the learning journey of students utilizing YouTube as an educational resource. Tailored with an array of intuitive controls, this extension transcends the conventional YouTube experience, equipping users with enhanced functionalities to navigate, customize, and optimize their study sessions. Version 1.1.1 introduces a comprehensive suite of controls, each designed to cater to specific aspects of the learning process:

It includes the following functinalities:
1. Playback Speed Control: Unlocking the Power of Pace (Upto 10x).
2. Filters Control: Enhancing Visual Clarity (Saturation, Contrast, Brightness).
3. Inversion (To enable dark mode to white background videos).

Release Notes (Version 1.1.1):
1. Fixed Some Bugs
2. Made Interaction with keys efficient and fast
